pet.name: Panther *COURTESY POST*
pet.description:
I'm a one year old cuddle bug who was abandoned with my pregnant sister. Iâ€™m so thankful for my foster mommy who took us in and already found my sister and her kittens a home. She has taken really good care of me too, but I am not too fond of her 12-year old shih tzu, and her allergies can't handle all the love I have to give. She even got me neutered, vaccinated, and on a flea treatment for my new pet parent(s). My foster mom will also include my litter box and feeding bowls so all you have to do is love me.
I love to nuzzle up close under your chin and I give great paw massages. When I have had a really rough day lounging around, playing with my toys or watching for lizards, I like to lay my head on your chest or just sit on your lap while you read a book or watch television. I am a gentle black cat who just wants to be loved forever.
All I need is a loving forever home, so please contact my foster mommy, Shannon, at 321-287-4235. Vet reference and $30 donation for KARE Oviedo rescue, please.
